scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py migrate && python manage.py loaddata fixtures/*.json

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: A lists of hostnames that the server will respond to

CCC_PASS.description: The CCC password. Used to bypass rate limits on LDAP

CAS_SERVER_URL.description: The CAS server to use, if any. Note that many CAS servers run on a whitelist.

DEBUG.description: Sets debug mode on/off for the site. If enabled, insecure (but soooo convenient...)
